ingredients.content: 3 oz unsalted butter, room temperature, diced

preparations.content: Place chocolate and cocoa powder into mixing bowl and chop <b>10 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add corn syrup, whipping cream, butter and salt and cook <b>5 min/195°F/speed 2<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and cook a further <b>10 min/195°F/speed 2<b>.
Mix <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer to airtight jars and let cool. Seal for gift giving and refrigerate until needed.
